title: 急！！！！村民捡不了东西！
author: White_Xu
txt_content: 村民捡不了东西，不繁殖怎么搞！

replies.author: sauce_mai
replies.txt_content:
输入：/gamerule mobGriefing true

原因：防止怪物破坏方快也禁止了村民收作物和捡物品

replies.author: White_Xu
